title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1045.10 - Animals in the transit center or on a bus
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1045.10 - Animals in the transit center or on a bus

State Regulations

Animals are prohibited from any bus or the transit center
except when the animal is a service guide dog, or when accompanied by a police
officer acting in an official capacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1045.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
